messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Prime Offer package.
What does the Monthly Prime Offer package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Monthly Prime Offer package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly Prime Offer package?

The Monthly Prime Offer package includes 300GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes (FUP of 200,000 minutes), 1500 off-net minutes, and a 1-month FREE subscription to PANDA PRO. It also includes 50 free international minutes to select countries. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *345*130#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Prime Offer package.
How can I activate the Monthly Prime Offer package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Monthly Prime Offer package?
How do I get the Monthly Prime Offer package?

You can activate the Monthly Prime Offer package by dialing *345*130#. The package offers 300GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes (FUP of 200,000 minutes), 1500 off-net minutes, and a 1-month FREE subscription to PANDA PRO.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Prime Offer package.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Prime Offer package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Monthly Prime Offer package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Prime Offer package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Prime Offer package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Prime Offer package.
How long is the Monthly Prime Offer package valid?
What is the validity period of the Monthly Prime Offer package?
For how many days does the Monthly Prime Offer package remain active?
The Monthly Prime Offer package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
